data.name: Space Hulk: Deathwing - Enhanced Edition: Skulls for the Skull Throne DLC
data.detailed_description:
Embrace the violence and wrath of two iconic loyalist Chapters with the free Skulls for the Skull Throne DLC for Space Hulk: Deathwing - Enhanced Edition. Equip new armour skins, banners and emblems from the renowned Angels of Redemption and Disciples of Caliban Space Marine Chapters!

This free DLC pack includes:


New cosmetics from the Angels of Redemption Chapter:
  • 1 weapon emblem
  • 6 armour skins, 1 for each existing class
  • 6 banners associated with their dedicated armour skins

New cosmetics from the Disciples of Caliban Chapter:
  • 1 weapon emblem
  • 6 new armour skins, 1 for each existing class
  • 6 new banners associated with their dedicated armour skins

data.short_description: Expand your customization options in Space Hulk: Deathwing - Enhanced Edition with the free Skulls for the Skull Throne DLC! Embrace the violence and wrath of two iconic loyalist Chapters with new armour skins, banners and emblems.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400/AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB, DirectX 11, AMD Radeon HD 7870/NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • Additional Notes: INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED FOR THE ONLINE GAME
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770/AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 4GB/AMD Radeon R9 290 4GB
  • Additional Notes: INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED FOR THE ONLINE GAME
